SpeedDifferenceFromTarget: Range: (-inf, 0)',  # Negative reward for deviation from target velocity, unbounded below
SpeedDifferenceWithLeader: Range: (-inf, 0)',  # Negative reward for speed difference with leader, unbounded below
HeadwayToLeader: Range: [0, inf)',  # Positive reward for maintaining headway, unbounded above
SpeedDifferenceWithFollower: Range: (-inf, 0)',  # Negative reward for speed difference with follower, unbounded below
ContinuousCollisionPenalty: Range: (-inf, 0)',  # Negative penalty for collision based on acceleration, unbounded below
